data.name: ServerInfo
data.value: A hivatalos szerver a wormnet1.team17.com, mindenki itt játszik.\n De néha karbantartás miatt nem érhető el, ilyenkor pedig itt lehet beállítani egy ideiglenes szervert.
data.comment: Server info when you click the "?" after ServerText in the login window

data.name: ClanInfo

data.comment: Clan info when you click the "?" after ClanText in the login window

data.name: TusLoginText
data.comment: TUS login label in the login window

data.name: TusNicknameText
data.comment: TUS nickname label in the login window when TUS login is selected

data.name: TusPasswordText
data.comment: TUS password label in the login window when TUS login is selected

data.name: WhatIsTusLoginLabel
data.comment: What is TUS login? question in the login window when TUS login is selected

data.name: WhatIsTusLoginText
data.value:
A TUS szó jelentése The Ultimate Site. Ez egy olyan weboldal neve, ahol rengeteg hasznos dolog található a játékhoz: ligák, kupák, tornák, séma fájlok, pályák, fórum, stb.

 Továbbá a snoopereket is támogatja. Ha a TUS felhasználóddal jelentkezel be, akkor a rangod a TUS ligában lévő rangod lesz és a klánod is automatikusan ki lesz töltve, és a weboldalon is látszik majd, hogy elérhető vagy.

 A weboldalon megadhatsz egy külön felhasználói nevet és jelszót is a snooper belépéshez.

 További indormációk: http://www.tus-wa.com/forums/announcements/bringing-back-wn-ranks-and-registered-usernames-4819/
data.comment: The text of the popup window when What is TUS login? link is clicked

data.name: LogInText
data.comment: The label of the login button in the login window

data.name: WAExeNotFoundTitle
data.comment: The title of the popup window when Great Snooper could not locate WA.exe

data.name: WAExeNotFoundText
data.value: Hoppá, úgy tűnik, hogy a Great Snooper nem találja a játékot indító WA.exe fájlt. Ennek a fájlnak a hiányában nem tudsz csatlakozni játékokhoz, illetve játékot indítani. Meg szeretnéd adni most ennek a fájlnak az elérési útvonalát? A beállításokban egyébként ez később is megteheted.
data.comment: The text of the popup window when Great Snooper could not locate WA.exe

data.name: WelcomeMessage
data.comment: Login window title and the welcome message in taskbar notification when you start Great Snooper

data.name: ServerMissingMessage
data.comment: When server is not selected

data.name: NickEmptyMessage
data.comment: When nickname is empty

data.name: NickStartsBad
data.value: A becenevednek az angol ábécé betűjével kell kezdődnie vagy a ` karakterrel.
data.comment: When nickname begins with wrong character (ex. 0Tomi)

data.name: NickHasBadChar
data.value: A becenevedben tiltott karakterek találhatók. Csak az angol ábécé betűi, számok és a -, valamint a ` karakterek engedélyezettek.
data.comment: When nickname contains any wrong character

data.name: ClanHasBadChar
data.value: A klánodban tiltitt karakterek találhatók. Csak az angol ábécé betűi és számok engedélyezettek.
data.comment: When clan name contains any wrong character

data.name: TusPasswordEmpty
data.value: Kérlek add meg a TUS jelszavad!
data.comment: When TUS password is empty

data.name: TusLoginFailTitle
data.comment: The title of the popup window when TUS login fails due to caching that MonkeyIsland always forgets to correct

data.name: TusLoginFailText
data.value: Egy hiba történt. Kérlek próbálkozz újra.
data.comment: The text of the popup window when TUS login fails due to caching that MonkeyIsland always forgets to correct

data.name: TusAuthFailTitle
data.comment: The title of the popup window when TUS nickname or password is incorrect

data.name: TusAuthFailText
data.value: A megadott felhasználói név vagy jelszó hibás volt.
data.comment: The text of the popup window when TUS nickname or password is incorrect

data.name: TusCommFailTitle
data.comment: The title of the popup window when communication with tus-wa.com fails

data.name: TusCommFailText
data.value: A tus-wa.com oldallal történő kommunikáció közben hiba történt.
data.comment: The text of the popup window when communication with tus-wa.com fails

data.name: NicknameInUseTitle
data.comment: The title of the popup window when the nickname is already in use on WormNet

data.name: NicknameInUseText
data.value: A megadott becenevet már valaki használja. Kérlek válassz egy másikat! Megjegyzés: ha megszakadt a kapcsolatod, akkor lehet várnod kell 1-2 percet amíg ezt észleli a szerver.
data.comment: The text of the popup window when the nickname is already in use on WormNet

data.name: WNCommFailTitle
data.comment: The title of the popup window when connecting to WormNet fails

data.name: WNCommFailText
data.value: Nem sikerült csatlakozni a szerverhez. Kérlek ellenőzid, hogy helyesen adtad-e meg a szerver elérési útját vagy próbálkozz később (lehet karbantartás van).
data.comment: The text of the popup window when connecting to WormNet fails

data.name: JoinMessage
data.comment: When a user joins a channel (the message will begin with the name of the user)

data.name: PartMessage
data.comment: When a user lefts a channel (the message will begin with the name of the user)

data.name: WNQuitWOMessage
data.comment: When a user lefts WormNet without message

data.name: WNQuitWMessage
data.comment: When a user lefts WormNet with message\n{0} will be the message

data.name: GSQuitWOMessage
data.comment: When a user lefts Gamesurge server (where #worms channel can be found) without message

data.name: GSQuitWMessage
data.comment: When a user lefts Gamesurge server (where #worms channel can be found) with message\n{0} will be the message

data.name: OfflineMessage
data.comment: When the user tries to send a message to somebody who is offline\n{0} will be the name of the user

data.name: ServerErrorMessage
data.comment: Error message from WormNet (ex. You are banned, flooder!)\n{0} will be the error message

data.name: ServerQuitMessage
data.comment: When WormNet sends quit message for the user (same as error message above, but this time the server will terminate the connection)\n{0} will be the error message

data.name: PMPingTimeoutMessage
data.value: There may be messages that this user could not receive!
data.comment: When you send private message(s) to a user who has lost his/her connection then the snooper will send this notification message for you when he/she will drop (Ping timeout: 180 seconds)

data.name: HightLightMessage
data.comment: Highlight message in taskbar notification\n{0} will be the name of the channel where the user was highlighted

data.name: PMOnlineMessage
data.comment: Online message in private chat. When a player, who the user has private chat opened with, comes online (the message will begin with the name of the user, ex. "<nick> is online.")\nThe same message will be in taskbar notification too

data.name: OnlineMessage
data.comment: Online message in taskbar notification (when a buddy joins)\n{0} will be the nick of the user

data.name: NotifOnlineMessage
data.comment: Online message for notificator (when you are looking for somebody)\n{0} will be the nick of the user\n{1} will be the name of the channel where the user joined

data.name: GSNicknameInUse
data.value: The selected nickname is already in use!
data.comment: When the user tries to change his/her nickname in #worms channel on GameSurge with command "/nick <newnick>" but <newnick> is already in use

data.name: GSNicknameChange
data.comment: When a player changes his/her name in #worms channel on GameSurge\n{0} will be the old nick of the player\n{1} will be the new nick of the player

data.name: ConversationAdded
data.comment: When a player adds somebody to the conversation\n{0} will be the nick of the player who adds somebody to the conversation\n{1} will be the nick of the player who is being added to the conversation

data.name: ConversationRemoved
data.comment: When a player removes somebody from the conversation\n{0} will be the nick of the player who removes somebody from the conversation\n{1} will be the nick of the player who is being removed from the conversation

data.name: ConversationKick
data.value: You have been removed from this conversation.
data.comment: When the snooper user is removed from a conversation

data.name: ConversationLeave
data.comment: When somebody leaves the conversation\n{0} will be the nick of the player who left the conversation

data.name: HostingTitle

data.name: GameNameLabel

data.name: HostingPasswordLabel
data.comment: Password label

data.name: UsingWormNat2
data.comment: Using WormNat2? question

data.name: AboutWormNat2
data.comment: About WormNat2 label

data.name: AboutWormNat2Text
data.value:
About WormNat 2:

 If you host with the game, then it will create the server on your computer and it will wait for players to join on a specified port (usually 17011). But most of the routers and firewall programs don't allow incoming connections, so nobody can join your game. You will need to enable port forwarding on your router and/or configure your firewall if you use one in order to let players join your game.

 WormNat2 uses a technique, that you can host games without incoming connections so your host will work properly. To make this possible it uses a dedicated proxy server, which actually handles all the connections.

 But since there is no support for other proxy servers, we would much rather that you configure your system to use normal way of hosting your games and use WormNat2 only if nothing else works so the proxy server will not be overloaded.

 You can find easy setup guides at http://worms2d.info/Hosting

 Enable loading WormKit modules are NOT needed to use WormNat2 hosting feature of the snooper!
data.comment: The text of the popup window when About WormNat2 is clicked

data.name: WormNat2GreetingTitle
data.comment: The title of the WormNat2 greeting popup window when somebody hosts a game using WormNat2

data.name: WormNat2GreetingText
data.value:
Greetings WormNAT2 user!

 This is a reminder message to remind you that WormNAT2
 is a free service. Using WormNAT2 tunnels all data
 through a proxy server hosted by the community, thus
 consuming bandwidth and other resources. Therefore,
 we would like to ask you to only use WormNAT2 when you
 have already tried configuring hosting the proper way.
 Don't forget that you can find instructions on how
 to set up hosting here:

 http://worms2d.info/Hosting
data.comment: The text of the WormNat2 greeting popup window when somebody hosts a game using WormNat2
